<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">
[Bind Undead](/Spells.aspx?ID=1449)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 318 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Bloodline**
[Undead](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=28)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 mindless undead creature with a level no greater than  bind undead ’s spell rank
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 day
</row>

</column>

---

With a word of power, you seize control of the target. It gains the [minion](/Traits.aspx?ID=109) trait. If you or an ally uses any [hostile actions](/Rules.aspx?ID=300) against the target, the spell ends.
name: Bind Undead
